title: Why can't i have "Clarity"
body: no clarity how can i as a support/mid/top/adc/jungler health saving keep in lane if that is my common purpose soraka no mana no mana pots were is this game heading ???

replies.body: Ahaha he's talking about 'Clarity' the Summoner Spell (http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Clarity ) . Think he is complaining that ever since Patch V5.22 you can't get it on Summoners Rift anymore. As for his English/Grammer i'm at a loss.
Could we have "clarity" in your post? What does any of that even mean?

when u try and change a good thing 2 much it is ruined mana pots and clarity the summoner spell gives u mana, make ga mr amour again this game is all about the broken carrys and no the skill set and its not a english essay so cry more bet riot is just full off yasuo mains

I have absolutely no idea what you just said, but you mentioned the words "clarity" and "why can't"  So I'm going to assume your question is along the lines of "why isn't there more clarity in the game?"
I'm going to ignore the parts about soraka and mana pots because I can't see anything specifically "non clarity" about them.

But the reason for "why isn't there clarity in the game?" Is because 'clarity' is just a word used by riot to justify changing whatever it is that they want to change whenever they want to change it, however if the community tells them there is a 'clarity' problem, they won't change it because; laziness/too hard/not worth the effort/(insert whatever reason here) this proves that 'clarity' is only inserted into the game when it suits riot, which answers why it's there some things and not in others.

Also on a completely unrelated topic to clarity (yet somehow is suppose to relate in your post) yes I do think we should bring mana pots back, especially the flask.
